languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс медленно кивает, старательно пряча горькое разочарование во взгляде.{/n} "Разумеется. Благодарю вас за ответ, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс медленно кивает, старательно пряча горькое разочарование во взгляде.{/n} "Разумеется. Благодарю вас за ответ, Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix nods slowly, at pains to conceal his bitter disappointment.{/n} "Of course. Thank you for your answer, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс медленно кивает, старательно пряча горькое разочарование во взгляде.{/n} "Разумеется. Благодарю вас за ответ, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix nods slowly, at pains to conceal his bitter disappointment.{/n} "Of course. Thank you for your answer, Lord Captain."
{n}Heinrix nods slowly, at pains to conceal his bitter disappointment.{/n} "Of course. Thank you for your answer, Lord Captain."
{n}Heinrix nods slowly, at pains to conceal his bitter disappointment.{/n} "Of course. Thank you for your answer, Lord Captain."
{n}Heinrix nods slowly, at pains to conceal his bitter disappointment.{/n} "Of course. Thank you for your answer, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}海因里希慢慢地点着头，竭力掩饰他心中的失望与苦涩。{/n}“没问题，舰长大人。感谢你的回答。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods slowly, at pains to conceal his bitter disappointment.{/n} "Of course. Thank you for your answer, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希慢慢地点着头，竭力掩饰他心中的失望与苦涩。{/n}“没问题，舰长大人。感谢你的回答。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix asiente lentamente, esforzándose por no mostrar su amarga decepción.{/n} «Por supuesto. Gracias por responder, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods slowly, at pains to conceal his bitter disappointment.{/n} "Of course. Thank you for your answer, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix asiente lentamente, esforzándose por no mostrar su amarga decepción.{/n} «Por supuesto. Gracias por responder, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、落胆を隠そうとしながら、ゆっくりとうなずいた。{/n}「もちろんだ。応えてくれてありがとう、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods slowly, at pains to conceal his bitter disappointment.{/n} "Of course. Thank you for your answer, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、落胆を隠そうとしながら、ゆっくりとうなずいた。{/n}「もちろんだ。応えてくれてありがとう、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hoche lentement la tête sans parvenir à masquer sa déception.{/n} « Bien entendu. Merci pour votre réponse, seigneure-capitaine. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods slowly, at pains to conceal his bitter disappointment.{/n} "Of course. Thank you for your answer, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hoche lentement la tête sans parvenir à masquer sa déception.{/n} « Bien entendu. Merci pour votre réponse, seigneure-capitaine. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix nickt langsam. Es tut ihm weh, seine bittere Enttäuschung zu verbergen.{/n} "Natürlich. Danke für Eure Antwort, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods slowly, at pains to conceal his bitter disappointment.{/n} "Of course. Thank you for your answer, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix nickt langsam. Es tut ihm weh, seine bittere Enttäuschung zu verbergen.{/n} "Natürlich. Danke für Eure Antwort, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Acıyla bezenmiş hayal kırıklığını gizlemeye çabalayan Heinrix, hafifçe başını eğiyor.{/n} "Elbette. Cevabın için teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods slowly, at pains to conceal his bitter disappointment.{/n} "Of course. Thank you for your answer, Lord Captain."
